item.description:
Fixes and Improvements

  • The currently selected area group is used as the default area group for new areas
  • Improved the text colours in the sidebar and content view

Known Issues

  • When creating or updating an item, only the corresponding sidebar item is selected
  • When creating a new item, the Title Prefix text field is focused instead of the Title text field
  • When creating a new item from the File → New menu, the currently selected items are not used as defaults for the new item. Use the Create Item menu in the toolbar instead
  • The New Location window is initially narrower than intended

New Features

  • Added the ability to create and update areas (and area groups)

Fixes and Improvements

  • The Create Item and File → New menus are now sorted based on hierarchy
  • Fixed a bug that caused the update installation to fail
  • The app now searches for updates automatically

Known Issues

  • When creating or updating an item, only the corresponding sidebar item is selected
  • When creating a new item, the Title Prefix text field is focused instead of the Title text field
  • When creating a new item from the File → New menu, the currently selected items are not used as defaults for the new item. Use the Create Item menu in the toolbar instead
  • The New Location window is initially narrower than intended

New Features

  • Added an app icon
  • Added an opening year field to locations

Fixes and Improvements

  • The inspector now shows the selected entry correctly
  • Resorts and locations are now sorted by their opening year
  • Fixed a bug that prevented empty locations from being deleted
  • MAPO windows and tabs can now have their own independent selection
  • The “New Resort” and “New Location” windows are narrower by default
  • Fixed a bug where opening the “New Resort” or “New Location” windows would not generate a new ID
  • The first available sidebar item is now automatically selected
